Events that occurred on 25 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1948 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 113.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 320.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Patrick Hunt, who is in prison.
1976 - Hilary Arthur Reuel, J.R.R. Tolkien's brother, dies.
2021 - Tolkien's Modern Reading by Holly Ordway is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothl√≥rien.
Gandalf casts down the Balrog, and passes away. His body lies on the peak. The Endless Stair is destroyed.
